title: Relationships & Communication
description: Learn vocabulary for talking about relationships, emotions, and communication.

words.meaning: the way two people or things are connected
words.example: They have a great relationship with their neighbors.
words.exampleTranslation: 그들은 이웃과 좋은 관계를 맺고 있어요.

words.meaning: belief that someone is honest and reliable
words.example: Trust is essential in any friendship.

words.meaning: to help or encourage someone
words.example: My family has always supported my decisions.
words.exampleTranslation: 제 가족은 항상 제 결정을 지지해 왔어요.

words.meaning: to say sorry for something you did wrong
words.example: I apologize for being late.

words.meaning: to stop being angry with someone
words.example: I've forgiven him for what he said.

words.meaning: to disagree or fight with words
words.example: They often argue about money.

words.meaning: an agreement where both sides give up something
words.example: A good relationship requires compromise.

words.meaning: feeling unhappy because someone has something you want
words.example: He gets jealous when she talks to other people.
words.exampleTranslation: 그는 그녀가 다른 사람들과 얘기하면 질투해요.

words.meaning: always supporting someone or something
words.example: She's a loyal friend who's always there for me.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀는 항상 곁에 있어주는 충실한 친구예요.

words.meaning: always telling the truth
words.example: Being honest is the foundation of a good relationship.

words.meaning: a failure to understand correctly
words.example: The argument was just a misunderstanding.

words.meaning: to be grateful for something
words.example: I really appreciate your help.

words.meaning: admiration for someone
words.example: Mutual respect is important in any relationship.

words.meaning: to share information or feelings
words.example: It's important to communicate openly.

words.meaning: to say negative things about someone or something
words.example: Try not to criticize others too harshly.
words.exampleTranslation: 다른 사람을 너무 가혹하게 비판하지 마세요.

words.meaning: to give confidence or hope to someone
words.example: My parents always encourage me to follow my dreams.
words.exampleTranslation: 부모님은 항상 꿈을 좇으라고 격려해 주세요.

words.meaning: able to wait without getting upset
words.example: You need to be patient with children.

words.meaning: thinking about other people's feelings
words.example: It was considerate of you to help.

words.meaning: to tell secrets to someone you trust
words.example: I can confide in her about anything.

words.meaning: a strong connection between people
words.example: We have a strong bond because we grew up together.
words.exampleTranslation: 함께 자라서 우리는 강한 유대를 갖고 있어요.

words.meaning: to keep something in good condition
words.example: It's hard to maintain friendships when you live far away.

words.meaning: to show feelings through words or actions
words.example: It's important to express your feelings.

words.meaning: the ability to understand other people's feelings
words.example: Empathy is key to good communication.

words.meaning: to find a solution to a problem
words.example: They managed to resolve their differences.

words.meaning: can be trusted to do what is needed
words.example: He's a reliable person who always keeps his promises.
words.exampleTranslation: 그는 항상 약속을 지키는 믿을 수 있는 사람이에요.

exercises.question: _____ is essential in any good friendship.
I need to _____ for my mistake yesterday.
The argument was just a _____. We didn't really disagree.
Good relationships require _____ - both people need to give and take.
I really _____ your help with the project.
It's important to _____ your feelings clearly.
He always _____ me to try new things.
I can _____ in her about anything - she keeps all my secrets.
We have a strong _____ because we've been friends since childhood.
